synopsis.text: This animated film tells the story of a chance encounter between a young island girl and a mysterious ocean-dwelling boy. One day while at the seashore, the girl accidentally drops her cherished anklet into the sea. A boy with magical abilities finds the anklet and returns it to the grateful girl, sparking the beginning of an unlikely friendship. What follows is a nostalgic tale that explores the harshness and splendor of the ocean through symbolic moments centered around the girl's anklet. Though coming from vastly different worlds, the two children form a heartwarming bond that speaks to the connective power of small kindnesses. Rendered through stunning animation, this graduation project turned 2019 film promises to be a visual feast that reminds viewers of the joys found in simple human connection.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
